translation.aboutMe.label: Profile
translation.aboutMe.description: As a telecommunications engineer with a strong background in software development, I am deeply enthusiastic about all things tech and am constantly seeking out opportunities to broaden my knowledge and hone my skills. I also thrive on collaboration and value the chance to work alongside other talented professionals to achieve shared goals.

translation.experience.works.0.title: PRODUCT MANAGER
translation.experience.works.0.description.0: Experience in the complete product development cycle, from conception to launch and continuous improvement.
translation.experience.works.0.description.1: Ability to conduct market research, understand customer needs, and identify market opportunities.
translation.experience.works.0.description.2: Successful experience in managing and coordinating teams of software developers, firmware developers, and designers, ensuring efficient collaboration aligned with project goals.
translation.experience.works.0.description.3: Knowledge in optimizing user experience, conducting usability tests, and gathering feedback to improve product usability and satisfaction.
translation.experience.works.0.description.4: Building strong relationships with industry companies, achieving goal alignment and fruitful collaborations.
translation.experience.works.0.description.5: Familiarity with popular product management tools like ClickUp or Trello for SCRUM implementation.
translation.experience.works.1.title: FULL-STACK DEVELOPER
translation.experience.works.1.description.0: Front-end development of web platforms using React JS.
translation.experience.works.1.description.1: Serverless back-end development using Node JS.
translation.experience.works.1.description.2: Cloud infrastructure development on Amazon Web Services.
translation.experience.works.1.description.3: Native mobile application development with React Native.
translation.experience.works.1.description.5: Firmware development for IoT device microcontrollers with Arduino.
translation.experience.academic.0.career: Master's Degree in Telecommunication Technologies Engineering
translation.experience.academic.0.description: Completing the Master's in Telecommunications has been a catalyst for my interest in full-stack development and IoT networks. During my internship, I had the opportunity to be immersed in a working environment related to these topics, which allowed me to apply my newly acquired knowledge from the Master's degree and have a deeper understanding of these technologies. As a result, I have realized that I have a great passion for these fields and wish to continue to develop in them. The Masters has provided me with the skills and knowledge necessary to succeed in this field and has helped me find my way to an exciting career in software development and telecommunication networks.
translation.experience.academic.1.description: During my Erasmus stay in Warsaw, I carried out my final thesis in which I was directly involved in a project at the Politechnika Warszawska University. The project developed LoRa communication between IoT devices that measured certain compounds in the city's sewage system and sent the data via a LoRaWAN network to a server in the university's cloud. This experience allowed me to develop my microcontroller programming skills as well as enhanced my understanding of IoT networks for integration with cloud services.
translation.experience.academic.2.description: As a telecommunications engineer specializing in telematics, I have advanced skills in telecommunications networks, network design and management, network security, software and application development, troubleshooting, project management skills, and business and management knowledge. These skills enable me to design, implement and manage high-quality telecommunications networks, solve telematics and data communications problems, and improve business efficiency and competitiveness.
